paper_abstract: A Mobile Adhoc Network (MANET) is collection of mobile nodes and communicates using wireless network without having any fixed infrastructure. This paper proposes an algorithm used to allocate the resources for multimedia applications using mobile agent technology in MANET. In addition to that, it allocates the resources for hand-off applications and new applications. (C) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An efficient resource allocation scheme for multimedia applications in MANET
